prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon with sleek, blue skin and a long, flexible tongue.
Generate a ninja-inspired Pokemon that blends into its surroundings with dark colors.
Show me a Pokemon that can swim gracefully and has stealthy movement abilities.
Design a Pokemon that excels in combat with agility and water-based attacks.
Imagine a Pokemon that has unique blue patterns and is known for its speed.
Make a bipedal Pokemon that can use both water and ninja-like techniques.
Give me a Pokemon that thrives in both urban and natural environments.
